Package io.micronaut.guides.core.asciidoc

Class AsciidocConfigurationProperties

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.guides.core.asciidoc.AsciidocConfigurationProperties
All Implemented Interfaces:
AsciidocConfiguration
@Internal @ConfigurationProperties("asciidoc") public class AsciidocConfigurationProperties extends Object implements AsciidocConfiguration
AsciidocConfigurationProperties is a class that implements the AsciidocConfiguration interface. It is annotated with @Internal and @ConfigurationProperties to define configuration properties for Asciidoc processing.
